hero.name: Abdou
hero.subtitle: Top Full Stack Developer from Cameroon
hero.description: One of the best Full Stack developers in Cameroon. I build high-performance web applications, cloud-native ERP systems, and modern interfaces with Angular, React, Vue.js, and Laravel.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: One of the best Full Stack developers in Cameroon
about.description: I'm Chirac NJUTAPMVOUI, a Full Stack developer based in Douala, Cameroon. With over 3 years of experience and 15+ successfully delivered projects, I specialize in building high-performance web applications and ERP systems with Angular, React, Vue.js, and Google Cloud Platform.
about.passion: Recognized among the top web developers in Cameroon, I transform complex ideas into innovative digital solutions. From ERP development for logistics to deploying cloud-native architectures on Google Cloud Platform, every project is an opportunity to push boundaries.
about.approach: My expertise spans the entire technical stack: Angular 19, React, Vue.js for frontend, Laravel and Node.js for backend, and Google Cloud Platform for deployment. This comprehensive mastery allows me to deliver robust, scalable, and high-performing applications.
about.skillsDescription: An overview of my technical expertise, organized by areas of specialization.

mcs.title: Full Stack Developer & Angular Specialist - MULTI CANAL SERVICE
mcs.description: Development of a complete ERP system with Angular 19.2.0 for last-mile logistics. Deployment on Google Cloud Platform with Cloud Functions and Cloud Run. Implementation of automated Telegram notifications, Firebase purge via Cloud Functions, and full serverless architecture.

davinci.title: Full Stack Developer - DA VINCI IT SOLUTIONS
davinci.description: Development of modern web applications with React.js, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Creation of a blog application and an expense management system with OAuth authentication. Full design of the Adna Congress project with Laravel API and Vue.js.

adaa.title: Full Stack Developer & Tester - ADAA
adaa.description: Development and maintenance of Jobs ADAALearning and ADAA Summit platforms. Functional testing for 2 months then full stack development for 6 months.

geno.title: Full Stack Developer - GENO CONSULTING
geno.description: Development of Africa Unity, a complete platform for managing events, articles, and online training with Vue.js 3 on the frontend and Laravel API on the backend.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: 15+ projects successfully delivered in Cameroon and Africa - Web applications, ERP systems, cloud platforms

project1.title: Express Delivery ERP System
project1.description: Complete ERP system for last-mile logistics with Angular 19.2.0, deployed on Google Cloud Platform with Cloud Functions and automated Telegram notifications.
project1.problem: Manual delivery management led to delays and tracking errors.
project1.solution: Development of a serverless architecture on GCP with Angular and Firebase.
project1.result: 40% reduction in processing times and real-time tracking for clients.

project2.title: Adna Ndogbatjeck Congress
project2.description: Event management platform with continuous integration system
project2.problem: Difficulty managing registrations and communication for a large event.
project2.solution: Centralized platform with Vue.js and Laravel, including a robust CI/CD pipeline.
project2.result: Smooth management of +500 participants and automated deployments without interruption.

project3.title: Expense Tracking Application
project3.description: A modern web application to track and manage personal expenses with interactive charts.
project3.problem: Lack of visibility on daily personal finances.
project3.solution: Interactive React dashboard with data visualization via Recharts.
project3.result: Intuitive interface enabling quick analysis of spending habits.

project4.title: Africa Unity
project4.problem: Fragmentation of professional networks in Africa.
project4.solution: Unified professional social network with high-performance Laravel backend.
project4.result: Facilitated connections between professionals from multiple African countries.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.subtitle: Over 3 years of Full Stack development experience in Cameroon. From modern web applications to cloud-native ERP systems, discover the projects that make me one of the best developers in Cameroon.

mcs.title: Full Stack Developer - Angular/ERP
mcs.description: Complete ERP system for logistics management with interconnected modules
responsibilities: Development of a complete ERP system for last-mile logistics with Angular 19.2.0
Implementation of Standalone components and Lazy Loading to optimize performance
Creation of a state management system with RxJS (BehaviorSubjects) for real-time synchronization
Development of functional modules: Dashboard, User Management, Orders & Deliveries, Stock
Deployment of Laravel applications on Google Cloud Platform with Cloud Run
Deployment of Angular applications on Google Cloud with Cloud Functions
Implementation of Cloud Functions for automatic Firebase database purge
Development of Telegram notification system via Cloud Functions
Configuration of Cloud Run for microservices management and auto-scaling
Integration of PrimeNG 19.1.2 with Tailwind CSS for a modern and responsive interface
Implementation of security with AuthGuard and JWT interceptors
Development of the POS (Point of Sale) module for fast order taking
keyFeatures: Complete user management with roles and permissions
Real-time tracking of orders and deliveries
Multi-site management of stocks and inventories
Complete traceability system with activity logs
Generation of PDF and Excel reports
Automated deployment on Google Cloud Platform
Real-time Telegram notifications via Cloud Functions
Automatic Firebase database purge with Cloud Run
mcs.architecture: Cloud-native architecture with Angular frontend deployed via Cloud Functions, Laravel backend on Cloud Run, Firebase database with automatic purge, and integrated Telegram notification system
